Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 89th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1972...
Had first career hit on 7/14/1976, off Ruby Thomas (DIA)...
Injured on 5/12/1979 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/19/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $481,500 per year...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1983, off Ray Barnett (BC)...
